title: Somali Youth League
summary: The Somali Youth League (SYL) (Somali: Ururka Dhalinyarada Soomaaliyeed ğ’šğ’‡ğ’šğ’‡ğ’ğ’– ğ’Šğ’–ğ’ğ’˜ğ’’ğ’•ğ’–ğ’‡ğ’–ğ’†ğ’– ğ’ˆğ’ğ’‘ğ’›ğ’ğ’˜ğ’•ğ’œğ’†, Italian: Lega dei Giovani Somali or Lega Somala della GioventÃ¹), initially known as the Somali Youth Club (SYC), was the first political party in Somalia. It played a key role in the nation's road to independence during the 1940s, 1950s and 1960s.
